person.persName: Robert Purdy (1st Lieut., 37th KY Vol. Inf.)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Son of Daniel and Elizabeth Purdy. Married to Mary Purdy. Father of Annie B. Purdy and Walter B. Purdy. Blacksmith in Marion County in 1860. Mustered into service as a sergeant of the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) on October 28, 1861. Discharged on September 31, 1863. Promoted to 1st Lieutenant of 37th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) in 1863. Mustered into service on October 24, 1863, and mustered out on December 29, 1864.
